terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.agree: I agree to the Terms of Use. (Click Here)
terms.text:
Welcome to InterZone!

By using this app, you agree to the following terms:

• You will not post or share any abusive, threatening, offensive, or hateful content.

• You will not harass or bully others.

• You agree to our zero-tolerance policy for objectionable content.

• You may report inappropriate content via the flag feature.

• You may block users that are offensive to you.

• We reserve the right to remove content and suspend accounts that violate these terms.

• For support, contact us at interzone.devs@gmail.com

Your data is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

(Scroll down to accept)
